overview: The main character with an appearance complex is a single woman who sells ice cream in a park. Lonely in a world where everyone seems happy except her own, she falls in love with her handsome man but is rejected, and her second love, which she courageously confesses to her, is also frustrated. Filled with her rage against her world, she takes vengeance on the men. But what awaited her, who had achieved her revenge, was not her happiness, but another revenge.
title: Breast Bunny
